rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious open area with large windows facing the east for morning sunlight and enhanced Vastu energy. Decorated in a Bohemian style with eclectic art, rugs, and vintage furniture.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: The main bedroom is centrally located near the north side of the house for good health and harmony according to Vastu. It features large windows on the east wall and a private balcony for natural light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Adjacent to the bedroom with water elements placed carefully according to Vastu guidelines. Minimalistic design with eco-friendly fixtures.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym located in the southwest corner of the villa ensuring optimum space and minimal distractions. Features include mirrored walls and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Situated in a quiet, north-eastern area to maximize concentration and productivity as per Vastu principles. Equipped with ample natural light and ergonomic design elements.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A welcoming entrance facing the south, ensuring positive energy flow while maintaining security.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Provides access from the bedroom to an east-facing balcony, enhancing natural lighting and air circulation.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Strategically placed windows in each room for optimal sunlight exposure and ventilation according to Vastu guidelines.
